attributes.action: ensure that MP's pay rises never exceed the values awarded to other public and civil servants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In these days of severe financial restraint it is preposterous that MPs are allowed to award themselves pay rises that exceed those that are given to other public service employees. Recently many such workers had been promised an agreed payrise, just to have it slashed in about half. How can MPs justify such a rise on top of the outrageous expense claims we all pay for?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
